themes

Class Theme

  • Object
    • Theme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSerialisable

    public class Theme
extends Object
implements XMLSerialisable
    A theme collects a series of GFXElements that were intended to be displayed together i.e.: for a particular chart. The element types held are described in GFXElement In addition the theme itself has a name, and a root directory which are held in this class Themes are serialisable so end up with the theme elements on disk
    Author:
    tony

        private static final Path rootDir

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the item name of the theme. This is currently used heavily by JAVAFX's combo box, which contains themes, not strings, so uses this to display name
        Specified by:
        toString in interface XMLSerialisable
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
